markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 637 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Once living, these creatures were infused after death with negative energy and soul-corrupting evil magic. When reduced to 0 Hit Points, an undead creature is destroyed. Undead creatures are damaged by [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) energy, are healed by [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118) energy, and don't benefit from [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89) effects.
name: Undead
